FROM( SELECT BMM_KEYNO , @rownum:=@rownum+1 as COUNT , LEFT(BMM_REGDT,10) BMM_REGDT , IFNULL(U.UI_REP_NAME,BMM_REGNM) BMM_UI_NAME , M2.MN_NAME BMM_HOME_NAME , BMM_SIZE , M1.MN_NAME BMM_MN_NAME , BMM_FILE_NAME FROM T_BOARD_MAINMINI B LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON B.BMM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M1 ON B.BMM_MN_KEYNO = M1.MN_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M2 ON B.BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M2.MN_KEYNO ,(SELECT @rownum:=0)TMP WHERE BMM_DELYN = 'N' )AA WHERE 1=1
AND COUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BMM_HOME_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BMM_MN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BMM_SIZE = #{item.searchKeyword}
AND BMM_UI_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BMM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( COUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BMM_HOME_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BMM_MN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BMM_SIZE = #{item.searchKeyword} OR BMM_UI_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BMM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') )

SELECT BMM_KEYNO , CONCAT('BMM',CAST(RIGHT(BMM_KEYNO,10) AS UNSIGNED )) KEYNO , LEFT(BMM_REGDT,10) BMM_REGDT , IFNULL(U.UI_REP_NAME,BMM_REGNM) BMM_UI_NAME , M2.MN_NAME BMM_HOME_NAME , M2.MN_URL BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_URL , BMM_SIZE , M1.MN_NAME BMM_MNNAME , BMM_FILE_NAME , BMM_FILE_PATH , BMM_FORM , BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_C , BMM_MN_KEYNO , M3.HM_TILES BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_TILES FROM T_BOARD_MAINMINI B LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON B.BMM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M1 ON B.BMM_MN_KEYNO = M1.MN_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M2 ON B.BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M2.MN_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_HOME_MANAGER M3 ON B.BMM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M3.HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C WHERE BMM_DELYN = 'N'
AND BMM_KEYNO = #{BMM_KEYNO}

SELECT CONCAT('COLUMN', CAST(RIGHT(BL_KEYNO,10) AS UNSIGNED)) DATASET, BL.BL_COLUMN_NAME COMMENT_NAME FROM T_BOARD_COLUMN BL, T_MENU_MANAGER MN WHERE BL.BL_BT_KEYNO = MN.MN_BT_KEYNO AND MN.MN_KEYNO = #{MN_KEYNO} AND BL.BL_USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT BMM_KEYNO, BMM_FORM, CONCAT('FORM', CAST(RIGHT(BMM_KEYNO,10) AS UNSIGNED)) FORM_NAME FROM T_BOARD_MAINMINI WHERE BMM_DELYN = 'N'
